data.name: Rust Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
The official soundtrack from one of the best selling survival games of all time, Rust. Featuring 29 tracks and over an hour of ambient music, composed and mastered by Alex Rehberg.

Available in FLAC and MP3.
data.about_the_game:
The official soundtrack from one of the best selling survival games of all time, Rust. Featuring 29 tracks and over an hour of ambient music, composed and mastered by Alex Rehberg.

Available in FLAC and MP3.
data.short_description: The official Rust soundtrack features over an hour of ambient music, composed and mastered by Alex Rehberg.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 750 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 1 GB available space
